alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Uintah County through 245 PM MDT... At 211 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 46 miles east of Sunnyside, or 48 miles south of Fort Duchesne, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Uintah County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
